name: Vedrfolnir
desc: One of the Five Sinners of Khaenri'ah, also known as "The Visionary."

customize.text: Vedrfolnir is one of the six people who should have prevented the disaster in Khaenri'ah and stopped the Vinster King from continuing to rock the foundation of the world.

Vedrfolnir, presumably, created stone tablets in Fontaine to document Egeria's original sin, the prophecy, and the future of Fontaine. In this way, he wanted to record the history of Fontaine's future in the past.

customize.name: Hroptatyr
customize.desc: One of the Five Sinners of Khaenri'ah, also known as "The Wise."

customize.name: Surtalogi
customize.desc: One of the Five Sinners of Khaenri'ah, also known as "The Foul."

customize.name: Rerir
customize.desc: One of the Five Sinners of Khaenri'ah, also known as "RÃ¤cher of Solnari."

customize.name: Rhinedottir
customize.desc: An alchemist, a member of the Hexenzirkel, one of the five Sinners of Khaenri'ah, and Albedo's mother. Rhinedottir created an army of shadowy monsters, who attacked Teyvat 500 years ago. She's also known as Gold and R.

customize.text: Together with Vedrfolnir, they couldn't resist the call of the Abyss and divided among themselves a power that could destroy the world. They became the Five Sinners, transcendent beings with a world-shattering power.

customize.name: Dainsleif
customize.desc: A former captain of the Khaenri'ahn Royal Guard, who was cursed by Celestia with immortality.

customize.text: Vedrfolnir's younger brother, who was the one out of six who didn't become a Sinner.

customize.name: Chlothar
customize.desc: A pure-blood Khaenri'ahn who was cursed with immortality by Celestia. He is a member of the Alberich Clan and the founder of the Abyss Order.

customize.name: Caribert
customize.desc: Chlothar Alberich's illegitimate son who became a hilichurl due to the Heavenly Principles' curse. He was used to create the Loom of Fate.

customize.text: Chlothar Alberich asked Vedrfolnir to help his son, Caribert, and Vedrfolnir gave him the Abyssal powers. Later, Chlothar founded the Abyss Order.
